unnormalised: Borem, tor tumi Bharotant bhitorlean vimanantlean vochunk sodtat, hẽm? Mhaka sangonk di, sarkem airlain nivddop tumcho proyog safol vo nash korunk xakta! Tem fokot bindu A thavn bindu B meren pavocho vixoy nhoi, tem anubhavachi vost, *yaar*! Dhillo aslolea vimanantlean tumchea Goeamchea suttiyek tontrek zaunk zai nam, nã?
normalised: Borem, tum Bharotant bhitorlean proveas korcheak sodtai, han? Mhaka sangonk di, sarkem airline nivddop tumchi yaatra ghadvonk vo naddonk sakta! Tem fokot point A than point B meren pavop nhoi, tem ek onubhav, yaar! tumchea Goa-che suttiek ujer zal'lea flytac lagun tras divonk tumkam naka, thik?

unnormalised: Atam, hanvem sumar soglleank ek pavtti tori udlam. SpiceJet chodd korun sogleant unnem aasa, zoxem Delhi-Mumbai vimanantlean ₹3500 zalea bhaxen zori tumi borem bhaxen adim book kelem (dhaktem mhonnchem, 2 mhoine?). Punn, tumkam zannam asa, tumi kitẽ diitat tem tumkam mellta. Hanvem aikola tãnnim kednaim dhillo zatat ani, ehem, *budget* snacks. Bori *samosa* virudhhan kitech nam, punn mhaka 2-ghonta udetaponacher odik dhruvasthayi kiteim zai.
normalised: Atam, hanvem lagbag soglleank ek pavtt tori proveas kela. SpiceJet chodd korun unnea kimtic asta, rupia tin hazar panch xem Delhi-Mumbai flightakhatir tum borem bhaxen mukharuch book kortat zalear (say, don mhoine?). Punn, tumkam khobor asa, tum jem daddtat tem tumkam mellta. Hanvem aikola ki tankam kiteak zalear ujer zata ani, budgetacho nashto. Eka borea samosak virodh na, punn mhaka don voranchea flighticher thoddem odik boreak lagta.

unnormalised: IndiGo sadharonnponnan mhaka zai tem aasa. Te samanyakritponnan velar astat, tãnnchi vimanantli kudd'dik borem borench saaf astat, ani tãnnank khaunk melltollea vostuncho boro vell aasa tumi adim book korunk xaktat. Ani, tãnnchi vimanantli seva sogllekodden aasa, disota! Fattlea vorsant hanvem tãnnak Kalkatta thavn Guwahati meren provas korunk vaprolo ani udetapon velar aslem. Ekach vattentli yatrek sumar ₹4800 dile.
normalised: IndiGo sadharanponnan mhojem vochpak zai toxem. Te sadharanponnan velar astat, tanchi vimananchi safai barobar asta, ani tankam borea jevnnanchi nivddi asta jem tum mukharuch book koronk sakta. Ani, tankam sogllekodden flights astat, dislem tor! Fattli voros hanvem tankam Kolkata than Guwahati proveas korunk vapralem ani flight velar asli. Rupia char hazar aatt xem ek vatten proveasak dile.

unnormalised: Air India, amcho priy *maharaja* (borem, tori tori!), Tata-chea kabjo kela tthavn apli rit bodlonk proitn korta. Te khatriponnan sudharonn korun asat, punn azunui kednaim thode... anischit. Punn, te chodd korun thoddea dhaktea xarank sidheponnan vochoixtt astat, dekhun kednaim tumkam dhyan diunk zaina! Zoxem, zori tumi Patna-k voitat tor, tumkam mellunk xakta Air India tumcho ekuch vikalp aasa ani sumar Rs. 6000 kharchik zatat.
normalised: Air India, amcho mogacho maharaja (borem, thoddi ritin!), Tata-n haddlea uprant apli game vaddounk proitn korta. Te nischit sudharop kortat, punn azun legit kiteak zalear… sodhinashil. Punn, te chodd korun tanim khub lhan xaramni direct proveas kortat, mhonnun kiteak zalear tumkam upai nastana asta! Kiteak zalear, tum Patna-k vetai zalear, tumkam Air India ekuch upai mellonk xakta ani rupia so hazar kharchonk xakta.

unnormalised: Magir Vistara aasa. Ah, Vistara! Zori tumkam thodi luxury zai (sambondhitponnan mhonnchem, narivo – ami azunui Bharotachea bhitorlea udetapona vixim ulaitat!), Vistara vochonk bori vatt aasa. Tãnnak odik paiank zaga aasa, bore khaonne astat ani samanyakritponnan odik umeddi anubhav mellta. Tãnnchim molya te vishai korpak vatt kortat punn; tea Mumbai-Delhi udetapona khatir kamit kam Rs. 7500 diunk zai.
normalised: Uprant asa Vistara. Ah, Vistara! Tumkam thoddi sukh-sovlott zai zalear (sandarbhikponnan sangop, of course – ami azun legit Bharotantlea gharaantlea flightsan vixim ulaitat!), Vistara proveas korpacho rosto. Tankam leg-room chodd asta, borea jevnnanchi sevai astat, ani sadharanponnan chodd ruchicho onubhav. Tanchi kimot dekhoun dita; Mumbai-Delhi flightakhatir atlean chodd rupia saat hazar panch xem diunk mellta.

unnormalised: Akasa Air novoch bhurgem aasa. Hanvem tãnnanchea sangata ek pavtti uchholam, Bangalore thavn Chennai meren. Vimanachi kudd'dik novi ani saaf asli ani karmachari logui vinonti kortole asle. Udetapon velarui aslem. Yatrecho kharch Rs. 3800 aslo.
normalised: Akasa Air novi bhurgea-bhat. Hanvem tankam fattim fokot ek pavtt proveas kela, Bangalore than Chennai meren. Vimanam novim ani nirmoll aslim ani nokoram-dhokriam legit vinomi asle. Flight legit velar asli. Proveasacho kharch rupia tin hazar aatt xem aslo.

unnormalised: Ani deal-am khatir poonk sodunk visrunk naka! Hea sogllea airlain-anchea sangata soglle vellar viktat. Tãnnchea email-anchea patrakanchi nondnni korunk zai, ani tumkam desconto melltollea bhadyanchea vixim suchna melltollo, khas korun off-seasonachea provasachea vellar (zoxem, mhonnchea bhaxen, Diwali-chea uprant). Tumchea tarikhancho tumi lavchika asle zalear tumkam khorench borem vikar mellunk xakta. Zoxem, hanvem fattlea mhoineant pausallea vellar Delhi thavn Goa udetapon ₹2999 khatir dekhlem!
normalised: Ani dealsanchea vixim vishvas thevunk visrunk naka! Hi soglle airlinesank veg-veglle sale sadharanponnan choltat. Tanchi email listsacher sign up kara, ani tumkam unnea kimtic ticketsanchea vixim notifications melltele, khas korun off-season-nt proveas kortana (kiteak zalear, Diwali uprant!). Tum ekdam faideak poddtele tumchea datesanchea vixim tum flexible astai zalear. Mhaka dislem Delhi than Goa flight rupia don hazar no xem ani no navafattlim mahinia monsoon-nt!

unnormalised: Sadaiv baggage allowance-k doblen poonk sod! Te niyom bodolta ravtat. Ani zori tumi kiteim nashtechim vortole zalear (zoxem, mhonnchea bhaxen, Chennai-ntlean tumi utthoiloli Tanjore-chi poromporik chitrakam), tumi dhyaan korun ti goll korta mhonn dhyaan divnk zai. Airlaines-acho tumchea vastuncho sadaroponnan komikponn nasata. Ani, tumchea udetapona adim 48 hrs web-an check-in korunk mhonnunk visrunk naka!
normalised: Vagnnuk bharti bhartichi check korunk visrunk naka! Te niyom badlota. Ani tum kitem tori nazu astai zalear (kiteak zalear, Tanjore-chi painting tum Chennai-nt ghetlea), tem samballun paka kara. Airlines sadharanponnan tumchea luggage-cher doiast ponniche nastat. Web check-in tumchea flightak fattim chalis ani aatt voramnim korunk ugddas theva!

unnormalised: Dekhun, tumchi sod poonk sod, molyeanchem tulna kor (tim online provasantlea ekagrikrutikarancheo vostu vaprat!), ani tipnneo vachat. Thoddi eke-size-chi-borem-soglleank zobab nam. Mhaka kitẽ borem zatat te tumkam borem zaunk xaktat nam, tem tumchea budget-ancher adharit asa, tumchea porambheanancher, ani tumi kedden voitat.
normalised: Mhonnun, tumchea vixim kholayen vicharop kara, kimot tulna kara (ti online proveas-tulnavali vapara!), ani reviews vacha. Ekuch zobab soglleak sarkho zata mhonnop na. Jem mhaka sarkhem zata tem tumkam sarkhem zanvchina, tumchea budgetacher, tumchea mukhelacher ani tumchea vechpak zayea zageak adharun.

unnormalised: Sukhichi yatra, ani *jai ho*! Tumchea udetapona velar zaunk di, tumchi vastun surakshitponnan pavo, ani tumcho chai ushnn zatat! tumcho Aadhaar card vortunk visrunk naka, fokot airline-n takach vicharlet tor.
normalised: Khuxal proveas, ani jai ho! Tumchea flights velar zanv, tumchea luggage samballun pauchea, ani tumcho chai gorom zanv! tumchea Aadhaar card samballun vorunk visrunk naka, kiteak zalear airline tanka magnni koronk xokta.
